product_name: WTB Speed She ProGel Saddle - Women's
long_description: Designed specifically for women, this cross-country and road saddle features ProGel for cushioning comfort. Soft shell with Comfort Zone(TM) channel helps relieve pressure on soft tissue without detracting from the support of the saddle. Features an abbreviated nose, a 6mm center drop and a slightly wider rear and mid-section for additional support. Rounded edges offer freedom of movement, allowing easy transitions. Made with durable synthetic cover and hollow chromoly rails.
short_description: Designed specifically for women, this cross-country and road saddle features ProGel for cushioning comfort.
